records.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
records.Description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
records.Actors: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana

records.Title: Prometheus
records.Description: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.
records.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Logan Marshall-Green, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron

records.Title: Split
records.Description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.
records.Actors: James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy, Haley Lu Richardson, Jessica Sula
